text: Mylla Bruzzo (born 20 April 1999) is a Brazilian water polo player. She was part of the Brazilian women's water polo team at the 2017 World Aquatics Championships. == References == == Other websites == * canada-brazil-womens- water-polo * fina-swimming-world-championships-2017 Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian water polo players
title: Mylla Bruzzo
